entry.title: Higher studies
entry.content: Now i have to proceed my life to another stage. thats my higher studies. i had no idea till this semester. then finally thought of proceeding in CAT ( even its tougher and herculian task to accomplish). I have my friend too there thats the only hope i have. Then a dull and lazy semseter i have ever faced is this one. I have to increase my english as well as mathematical ( i lack here) skill . I think i will do my best atleast for the sake of my parents (as did in hopeless lazy schooling ). Going to TIME at sundays as a part of coaching ( even I know they are not more than money grabbers ). I think of changing every thing in this world But Im a speck here oscillating in winds direction chaotically .

entry.title: Make your "LAMPP" glow to the world
entry.content:
if You are a beginner in linux then read this : www.apachefriends.org/en/xampp-linux.html I think it provides enough info about lampp

Test your lampp by moving http://localhost:[port]/ then do this create a account in dyndns : https://www.dyndns.com/ then configure your router to forward the url to appropriate dns say 192.168.1.1 for bsnl then open your apache's httpd.conf and change server name to dyndns host name if needed change port number to avoid google bots you are done with now check out your workstation in friends home and have a cheers!!!! :-)
